Name: Cafe de Huyschkamer
Review Text: I love this very stylish cafe. Food is simple but delicious. Coffee is also very good. Very relaxed environment. Probably can spend all day here with my laptop and do some very productive work! Love it! Love it!!

Name: Cafe de Huyschkamer
Review Text: What a nice surprise! Just stumble upon this place, not really looking for anything special, just late breakfast and we were treated to this amazing feast. My Eggs Royale was just out of this world, with crispy bread. Other scrambled eggs ‚Ä¶

Name: Cafe de Huyschkamer
Review Text: Nice place to hang out, can get crowded at times. Bar food available but they don‚Äôt have proper fried chicken for the finest palate. There‚Äôs space to sit outside and some space indoor, with tv for matches and stuff. Staff is friendly. If ‚Ä¶

Name: Cafe de Huyschkamer
Review Text: Lovely lunch. Delicious bread and cosy atmosphere. Located right next to frederiksplein, it's the perfect place for a lunch with a friend or a colleague.

Name: Cafe de Huyschkamer
Review Text: Amazing breakfasts and a very warm and cozy place.

Name: Cafe de Huyschkamer
Review Text: Stopped by for lunch and the food was absolutely delicious. Both, pasta and sandwich of the week. Friendly service too.

Name: Cafe de Huyschkamer
Review Text: This place saved us! After a long flight from Seattle, a person at the IAmsterdam store pointed us here. We finally found it and we're warmly greeted and quickly seated.  Breakfast was The Hangover sandwich and coffee. ‚Ä¶

Name: Cafe de Huyschkamer
Review Text: Cool bar in a nice quarter of Amsterdam. The staff was very kind and the drinks were good, the terrace is cozy and covered

Name: Cafe de Huyschkamer
Review Text: Food was really good, excellent portion size and great vibe. Coffee could improve as espresso was very watery! It should re ally be strong and thick from the coffee brewing process. Hope you take this onboard. Location is just superb. ‚Ä¶

Name: Cafe de Huyschkamer
Review Text: Nice atmosphere and great bar food. The burger is very good and the crispy chicken bits are especially delicious. ‚Ä¶

Name: Cafe de Huyschkamer
Review Text: I can't really comment on their food... as I never ate there.  But as for service? ‚Ä¶

Name: Cafe de Huyschkamer
Review Text: I went there yesterday around lunch time to try the Reuben sandwich! I saw really good reviews about your place. ‚Ä¶

Name: Cafe de Huyschkamer
Review Text: Went to this cafe today. Usually I like it. Nice and Cosy. Can be understaffed so long wait for food but it‚Äôs ok as sandwiches are tasty. But today was the worst food I have had in a cafe ever. All three of us got the chicken bites. 25 mins ‚Ä¶

Name: Cafe de Huyschkamer
Review Text: Is a good place to share with friends. The second floor has nice sofas to sit and talk but you always have to go down stairs to order. Anyway is a really nice plane, the music is good and the bartenders are really efficient.

Name: Cafe de Huyschkamer
Review Text: A huge variety of breakfasts, so delicious and good looking, the whole place is very comfortable and the staff is friendly. It is a nice place for breakfast with a warm ambience. ‚Ä¶

Name: Cafe de Huyschkamer
Review Text: Nice little bar with some very good breakfast options

Name: Cafe de Huyschkamer
Review Text: Pub popular with locals, not a tourist trap. Great service, at a good location. Tight space, but most folks have their pints outside anyway.

Name: Cafe de Huyschkamer
Review Text: Lovely Dutch bar, traditional with a touch of modern.  A good range of beers, wines, cocktails and spirits are available as well as an extensive menu. Seating is available on two levels inside as well as outside pavement seating. Free wifi available.  The only negative is the rather solemn staff who appear quite unfriendly.

Name: Cafe de Huyschkamer
Review Text: Cosy place ,friendly staff. Relaxing atmosphere with a decent lunch menu.

Name: Cafe de Huyschkamer
Review Text: A good choice of beers, nice staff, a great service

Name: Cafe de Huyschkamer
Review Text: Nice location for a hospitality place. If staff knows ‚Äòhospitality‚Äô....I seriously doubt it. Today, Sunday, for lunch we sat down and were greeted by the staff. We ordered two smoothies and had the (Arie‚Äôs)burger + fries and the sandwich ‚Ä¶

Name: Cafe de Huyschkamer
Review Text: Great Barista, delicious coffee and tea. Not overpriced.

Name: Cafe de Huyschkamer
Review Text: Simple tosti isn't simple. Melted cheese on top is lekker.  Salmon and bread were good too. Fresh ingredients

Name: Cafe de Huyschkamer
Review Text: Nice little place away from the chaos on a Saturday afternoon. Nice opportunities for people watching on the first floor.

Name: Cafe de Huyschkamer
Review Text: The place is cosy. The service is ok. The prices are reasonable....though i think is heavily understaffed....the staff is running....for a bar plate you need 30'....it is too much time...the owner must do smthg...

Name: Cafe de Huyschkamer
Review Text: Great food, good service, cold beer and good music. Always a fun place if it's just for lunch, a lazy brunch or late night drinks with friends.

Name: Cafe de Huyschkamer
Review Text: Fantastic sandwiches and creative use of ingredients really sets this place apart. Generous portions, nice interior, prompt service, and good beer all help to set this place apart!

Name: Cafe de Huyschkamer
Review Text: Great cafe/bar. Good food and friendly relaxed staff. Very busy at night. Not in central Amsterdam so believe this is popular with the locals.

Name: Cafe de Huyschkamer
Review Text:
Unfriendly staff. Spilled a drink over my coat and didn‚Äôt really apologize.
Other than that it‚Äôs your average Amsterdam brown caf√©.

Name: Cafe de Huyschkamer
Review Text:
Used to be one of my fav. But Saturday morning service is awful. Barely saying hello and ignoring you the rest of the time.  The breakfast was served with just dry toast with the eggs ( no butter or anything in addition )
Shame...

Name: Cafe de Huyschkamer
Review Text: The waiters are unbelievably rude !!! The rudest waiters I've ever come across. If I wanted my food thrown at me I would've joined the circus.... Which is a shame because the food is really nice.

Name: Cafe de Huyschkamer
Review Text: Good spot !very nice terrace, good service.

Name: Cafe de Huyschkamer
Review Text: Great beer and decent atmosphere. People are nice and the place is great to just kick back and relax. Will definitely be back.

Name: Cafe de Huyschkamer
Review Text: Very cool setting, upstairs feels connected to the downstairs. Lively atmosphere and the food looked pretty good.

Name: Cafe de Huyschkamer
Review Text: Great atmosphere and decor, good choice in music and not turned up too loud, affordable drinks and FANTASTIC upstairs balcony!

Name: Cafe de Huyschkamer
Review Text: Had a great late breakfast here. Food, drink and service all good, recommended

Name: Cafe de Huyschkamer
Review Text: Great place to watch the rugby world cup 2019. Nice weekend market nearby for the ladies who dont want to watch.

Name: Cafe de Huyschkamer
